name: SEX Motorsport 2021
description:
In this essential gaming experience, you can play as your favorite rappers as they race in battle. Famous characters include Jordan Michael, Shoot Dog, Dr. Gay Eloquante, Lil' Cabinet, Frank Sinatra, Rosa Parks, Emimen, Maury Povich, NPC Black Male #1, Mariah Carey, Halsey, and David Hasselhoff.

You will FEEL the action of the insane twists and turns from the game's handcrafted map. This game features an open-world experience, where you let your imagination limit your gameplay. Never before has the racing genre seen such high-quality and detailed graphics. 

SEX Motorsport 2021 comes with native support for 1280x720 (720p) resolution, so you can enjoy the true graphics of racing like a real man. Never before has in-game music been so good. Featuring magnificent lossless music and excellent sound effects, your headphones will thank you.

SEX Motorsport 2021 has support for all of the popular controllers in the simulation genre. These include the keyboard, mouse, wired keyboard, wireless mouse, gaming mouse, gaming keyboard, and gaming mousepad.
